content: Golden State Insurance confirmed a new process for out-of-network claims requiring pre-approval for rare autoimmune therapies. Dr. Evelyn Marsh at Coastal Immunology Center submitted a claim for patient ID#4582-9173, a 62-year-old with refractory myasthenia gravis, denied on 03/15/2024 due to missing specialist certification. The memo notes exceptional cases may appeal with neurology consult notes and plasma exchange records.
